definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: Before dawn, the wife went downstairs to prepare the family feast.
sentences.chinese: 在黎明前，妻子下楼去准备家里的酒席。

sentences.english: My dream is to work full-time at home.
sentences.chinese: 我的梦想是全职在家里。

sentences.english: It was raining cats and dogs outside, so we had to stay at home.
sentences.chinese: 外面大雨滂沱，我们只好呆在家里。

sentences.english: I have some problems at home these days could you please ask Mr. Wang for permission to leave?
sentences.chinese: 我这几天家里有事，你能帮我向王老师请假吗？

sentences.english: Have you found the model of SWFC at your own home?
sentences.chinese: 其实，环球的造型我们每个人家里都有。

sentences.english: Hong Kong TVB actress Yung Mei Ling was discovered dead at her home yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 香港无线电视演员容美玲被发现死在家里昨天。

sentences.english: Later, at home, Zilla would accuse him of being a coward and a weakling .
sentences.chinese: 等到了家里，齐拉就数落他是个懦夫，软骨头。

sentences.english: They’d like to invite guests over more often, too.
sentences.chinese: 他们也希望能够更多地请客人们到家里去。

sentences.english: In combination with the above, solar evacuated tubes provide for the domestic hot water needs.
sentences.chinese: 结合上述，采用太阳能真空集热管为家里提供热水。

sentences.english: Do yuo want to help your family save cash when times are tight ?
sentences.chinese: 既然经济不景气，想帮家里节省开支吗？

sentences.english: I went all the way there from home.
sentences.chinese: 我专门从家里赶过去听。

sentences.english: Yeah. I think it’s applied at home, though.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我认为它在家里用得上。

sentences.english: Don’t overindulge in the comforts of home.
sentences.chinese: 不要过度放纵在家里的安逸中。

sentences.english: I dare say you're dull at home.
sentences.chinese: 我敢说你在家里感到沉闷无聊。

sentences.english: Soon the house smelled fresh and piney , and the day took on a festive air.
sentences.chinese: 很快，家里闻起来很清新，带着节日的气息。

sentences.english: His family was very poor, but he worked hard at his studies even in early childhood.
sentences.chinese: 孔子的家里很穷，但是他从小就认真读书，刻苦学习。

definition: native place/place of origin/home state or region
a relative (i.e. family relation)/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
to go back to one's roots/to return to one's native place/by ext. to join one's ancestors (i.e. to die)
(informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
neighbors/next-door neighbors/related work units/colleagues doing related work
person from the same village, town or province/peasant (derog.)/(of a school of thought etc) follower
